post.body: Why aren't we going to Sydney for our trip? Plenty of guaranteeing to be had there.
That used to happen all the time to me =( I felt so lonely. New schedule is definitely nice.
How long will Twitter not be up for? Coz I can handle a day or two... but... otherwise Tritter might be getting lucky :/
Gimme $26. Plebe.
The whole time we were playing that game I kept nearly saying Twitter.
WOAH, I read your second two before the first and WOAH confuzled. BUT, read the first and understand now. Exxy holiday...
I feel bad about neglecting my tamagotchi, so I just took his battery out. Sorry, Noah!
Fun game: Go fruit shopping with someone. Every time they pick a fruit, say you want the same, but in a different variety. Lulz will follow
Epic Monopoly games leave deep scars. I'm still laughing at the last game, and I suspect I will be for a long time.
I think there's a bomb in my air vent. It's making a ticking sound. My dad could have just put a clock up there to mess with me. I'd do that
I slept on the air mattress again last night. It's so much fun! You don't even need a pillow!
Ambition is, unfortunately, the least interesting of all the Private novels. I am so gutted.
I can't stop thinking of Tritter every time I think of Twitter =( This makes me sad.
Don't you love it when a loser tries to make a joke, and you just burn them? I do.
Heh. I wrote in my Benrik diary. It feels so much more fun than an ordinary diary.
Woah, didn't post to twitter for a whole day. I must have been having fun or something!
I've been swearing a lot in my mind today. I might swear out loud at the stupid woman talking on her mobile in the damn toilet. Hang up! Ew.
Ah, i just love being screwed over in epic proportions. No really. I love it.
Tbh, I'd rather stay home all day. It's hot. Don't want money anyway.
Woah, best night's sleep I've had in aaaages. Good thing, too.
